keyword: calories in a large fry at mcdonalds
title: Calories in a Large Fry at McDonald's
meta_description: Discover calories in a large fry at McDonald's—about 510 kcal—plus full nutrition breakdown, macros, and quick tweaks for your meal.
h1: Calories in a Large Fry at McDonald's
assumptions: McDonald's standard large french fries (154 g serving), fried in vegetable oil blend, no customizations or dips.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and portion size; values based on official McDonald's data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: A large McDonald's fry contains about 510 calories, with 66 g carbs and 24 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Apple slices instead (for lower cal side)

faqs.q: How many calories in a large McDonald's fry?
What are the carbs in a large fry at McDonald's?
faqs.a: About 66 g total carbs, including 6 g fiber and 0 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is there protein in McDonald's large fries?
faqs.a: Yes, around 7 g protein per large fry.

faqs.q: How much sodium in a large McDonald's fry?
Do McDonald's fries have trans fat?
faqs.a: No trans fat (0 g) in a large fry, per official data.
